uk.me.burrell.social.api.impl
Class SocialRestAPIImpl

java.lang.Object
  uk.me.burrell.social.api.impl.SocialRestAPIImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SocialRestAPI
@Controller
@RequestMapping(value="/programme")
public class SocialRestAPIImpl
extends Object
implements SocialRestAPI

Default controller, using the Dispatcher model, whereby all requests are routed through here onto the relevant portions of the module

Author:
chrisburrell

Method Detail

addProgramme

@RequestMapping(method=POST)
public Programme addProgramme(@RequestBody
                                             Programme p)
Description copied from interface: SocialRestAPI
Adds a programme to the data store.
Operation Sample URL HTTP Method Notes
Creates a programme http://localhost:8080/social-war/social/ programme POST The body of the request contains the information, in the format of a Programme. The id field must not be populated

Specified by:
addProgramme in interface SocialRestAPI
Parameters:
p - the programme to be added. Throws an exception if [id] field is provided.
Returns:
the programme that was successfully created

updateProgramme

@RequestMapping(value="/{id}",
                method=PUT)
public Programme updateProgramme(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                Long id,
                                                @RequestBody
                                                Programme p)
Description copied from interface: SocialRestAPI
Updates the programme identified by parameter 'id' and makes the updates contained in parameter 'p'
Operation Sample URL HTTP Method Notes
Updates a programme http://localhost:8080/social-war/social /programme/11 PUT The body of the request contains the information updating information in the format of a Programme The id field must in the response body is ignored. All information is updated, so the user is required to retrieve the programme first in order to avoid resetting fields to null values

Specified by:
updateProgramme in interface SocialRestAPI
Parameters:
id - the id used to locate the relevant programme
p - the programme POJO containing the updates. The id of the received request is ignored in favour of the path variable. This is to match the REST specification.
Returns:
the updated programme with currently persisted values

deleteProgramme

@RequestMapping(value="/{id}",
                method=DELETE)
public void deleteProgramme(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                           Long id)
Description copied from interface: SocialRestAPI
Deletes a programme from the data store
Operation Sample URL HTTP Method Notes
Deletes a programme http://localhost:8080/social-war/social /programme/11 DELETE Deletes a programme. The request body is ignored.

Specified by:
deleteProgramme in interface SocialRestAPI
Parameters:
id - the id must be provided and is used to locate the correct programme

getProgrammeById

@RequestMapping(value="/{id}",
                method=GET)
public Programme getProgrammeById(@PathVariable
                                                 Long id)
Description copied from interface: SocialRestAPI
Finds a programme by id
Operation Sample URL HTTP Method Notes
Read a programme from the data store http://localhost:8080/social -war/social /programme/12?format=json GET The body of the request is ignored. The response is given in the format of a Programme.

Specified by:
getProgrammeById in interface SocialRestAPI
Parameters:
id - the id of the programme
Returns:
the Programme that matches the specified input Id

getProgrammesByCategory

@RequestMapping(value="/category/{category}",
                method=GET)
public ProgrammeList getProgrammesByCategory(@PathVariable
                                                            ProgrammeCategory category)
Description copied from interface: SocialRestAPI
Lists all programs that are in a particular category based on the 'category' parameter
Operation Sample URL HTTP Method Notes
Gets all programmes according to the category parameter http://localhost :8080/social -war/social/programme/category/DRAMA?format=json GET Results are returned in a list of Programme

Specified by:
getProgrammesByCategory in interface SocialRestAPI
Parameters:
category - the category of choice to filter the programmes returned
Returns:
a list (potentially empty) of all available programmes

getProgrammesByAvailability

@RequestMapping(value="/availability/{availability}",
                method=GET)
public ProgrammeList getProgrammesByAvailability(@PathVariable
                                                                boolean availability)
Description copied from interface: SocialRestAPI
Lists all programs that are available (or not) based on the 'available' parameter
Operation Sample URL HTTP Method Notes
Gets all programmes according to the availability parameter http:// localhost:8080/ social-war/social/programme/availability/true?format=xml GET Results are returned in a list of Programme

Specified by:
getProgrammesByAvailability in interface SocialRestAPI
Parameters:
availability - true to indicate available programmes should be returned
Returns:
a list (potentially empty) of all available programmes

getProgrammesByAvailabilityAndCategory

@RequestMapping(value="/category/{category}/availability/{availability}",
                method=GET)
public ProgrammeList getProgrammesByAvailabilityAndCategory(@PathVariable
                                                                           ProgrammeCategory category,
                                                                           @PathVariable
                                                                           boolean availability)
Description copied from interface: SocialRestAPI
Searches for all programmes by availability and category
Operation Sample URL HTTP Method Notes
Gets all programmes according to the category and availability parameter http:// localhost:8080/social-war/social/programme/category/DRAMA/availability/true GET Results are returned in a list of Programme

Specified by:
getProgrammesByAvailabilityAndCategory in interface SocialRestAPI
Parameters:
category - category of the programme
availability - available programmes
Returns:
the list of matching programmes

handleException

@ResponseStatus(value=NOT_FOUND,
                reason="The programme was not found")
@ExceptionHandler(value=ProgrammeNotFoundException.class)
public void handleException(ProgrammeNotFoundException ex)
Add some error handling for request not found

Parameters:
ex - the exception that is caught

handleException

@ResponseStatus(value=INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR)
@ExceptionHandler(value=SocialRuntimeException.class)
public void handleException(SocialRuntimeException ex)
All SocialRuntimeException will be returned as HTTP 400 BAD_REQUEST

Parameters:
ex - the exception that is caught

handleException

@ExceptionHandler(value=java.lang.IllegalArgumentException.class)
public void handleException(IllegalArgumentException ex,
                                                                                     javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
Handle illegal arguments as HTTP 400 BAD_REQUEST

Parameters:
ex - the exception that is caught
response - the response to be written to set the write code
